QuestData.Title: Revenge Delayed
QuestData.Description:
<The Korthian protector is gravely wounded and struggles to speak.>
Devourers... swarmed the sanctuary. Too few of us...
My duty... incomplete.
The Purpose... I...
<The protector's voice fades.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Devourers in the Sanctuary of Guidance.
